name: Acropolis: The Archaic Age
description: Acropolis: The Archaic Age is a strategy game set in ancient Greece that combines grand strategy elements with casual city building.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: AMD Athlon 4X 740 (or equivalent) Memory: 6 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 750 (or equivalent) DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 2 GB available space
